en-US.summary: Get today's frozen custard flavor of the day at 1000+ stores across the US.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask custard forecast what's the flavor at Mt. Horeb
Alexa, ask custard forecast for today's flavor at Madison
en-US.name: Custard Forecast
en-US.description: Custard Forecast tells you today's frozen custard flavor of the day at over 1,000 stores nationwide. Just ask for a store by city name and get the daily flavor read back to you. Covers Culver's locations across the US, plus select Milwaukee-area brands like Kopp's, Gille's, Oscar's, and more.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Say 'Alexa, open custard forecast' then ask 'what's the flavor at Mt. Horeb'. The skill queries a live API that returns today's flavor of the day. You can also try city names like 'Madison' or 'Milwaukee'.
